# Akashvanni - WhatsApp Business API Dashboard
# https://akashvanni.com

## About
Akashvanni is a WhatsApp Business API dashboard platform that helps businesses send WhatsApp messages at scale.
The platform provides:
- WhatsApp Business API integration via Twilio
- Message templates management
- Bulk messaging capabilities
- Real-time delivery reports
- Prepaid wallet system with Razorpay payments
- GST-compliant invoicing

## Target Users
- Small and medium businesses in India
- Marketing agencies
- E-commerce stores
- Service providers who need WhatsApp communication

## Key Features
1. **WhatsApp Integration**: Connect your WhatsApp Business Account via Twilio
2. **Message Templates**: Create and manage approved WhatsApp message templates
3. **Bulk Messaging**: Send messages to multiple recipients
4. **Delivery Reports**: Track sent, delivered, read, and failed messages
5. **Wallet System**: Prepaid balance with easy recharge via Razorpay
6. **Invoices**: Automatic GST-compliant invoice generation
7. **Campaign Reports**: Analytics on message delivery performance

## Pricing
- Pay-per-message model
- No monthly subscription fees
- Transparent pricing based on message type

## API
- Backend API: https://api.akashvanni.com
- Authentication: JWT Bearer tokens
- RESTful endpoints for all operations

## Contact
- Website: https://akashvanni.com
- Support: admin@akashvanni.com

## Technical Stack
- Frontend: React + Vite + Tailwind CSS
- Backend: FastAPI (Python)
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Payments: Razorpay
- WhatsApp: Twilio API
- Hosting: Hostinger (Frontend) + Railway (Backend)

## Public Pages
- / - Landing page with product information
- /landing - Alternative landing page URL
- /ecommerce/ - E-commerce focused landing page for abandoned cart recovery & WhatsApp automation
- /login - User authentication
- /register - New user registration

## Protected Pages (Require Authentication)
- /dashboard - Customer dashboard
- /messages - Message history
- /templates - WhatsApp templates
- /campaigns - Campaign reports
- /transactions - Payment history
- /invoices - Invoice downloads
- /add-money - Wallet recharge
- /profile - User settings
- /admin/* - Admin panel (admin users only)
